DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether school garden influence child 's dietary intake , nutritional knowledge , outcome .
DOC.brief_title: Effects School Gardens Children 's Diet , Nutritional Knowledge , Etc .
DOC.detailed_description: Schools New York , Washington State , Iowa , Arkansas randomly assign receive school garden associate curriculum serve wait list control group receive garden curriculum end 2-year study . Baseline data collect Fall 2011 . Garden intervention begin Spring 2012 . Follow-up data collect 6 , 12 , 18 month follow baseline data collection .
DOC.criteria: Schools least 50 % enrolled child qualify free + reduce price meal ( FRPM ) Schools already school garden .
